shortdesc.ph: Gets the download URL of the lyrics for a music resource.
Gets the download URL of the lyrics for a music resource.
Retrieves the download URL of the lyrics for a music resource.
Retrieves the download URL for the lyrics of a music resource.

p.codeblock: abstract getLyric(songCode: number, lyricType?: number): string;
abstract getLyric(songCode: number, lyricType?: number): string;
Future<String> getLyric({required int songCode, int lyricType = 0});
public abstract int GetLyric(ref string requestId, Int64 songCode, int LyricType = 0);

section.p: After this method is successfully called, the SDK triggers the callback to report the download URL of the lyrics.
